name: Sword story
description:
Sword story is a unique battle flag like game, ASR game (act / SLG / RPG). Players can get some materials to make by taking risks in the game, so as to get powerful equipment. In the adventure, players can gain experience value and gold coins. Experience value is used to upgrade character level and unlock various weapons, skills and cards.

Adventure begins in the form of a plot. In each chapter, we see all kinds of strange creatures. Each creature has its own thinking

The fighting style belongs to the fighting type. Monsters can also have powerful moves
